reviews.review_msg: Such a great prof. Too bad EDUC388 will not be offered any time soon. I always looked forward to attend lectures because of how funny and interesting he is. 10/10 prof.
such a nice man genuinely cares so much about his students

Even though Joel was sometimes disorganized, he was an amazing professor. This class is not as well known, but taking it with Joel was great. He was very passionate about teaching the topics and provided good lecture discussions during class. I highly recommend taking EDUC 388 if given a chance.
